name: VacuumWave
description:
Vacuum up items, while avoiding bombs!

  • W and D moves your vacuum left and right;
  • Left-clicking will turn on your vacuum in the direction it is looking.

Blue orbs are worth a few points, purple ones many points, while the red bombs will hurt you.

A game by Alice Figueiredo (GitHub, itch.io) and Thiago Reis Porto (GitHub, itch.io). The code for this game can be found here.
